roleset.name: unrest, aggitation

role.descr: attribute of arg1 experiencing turmoil (if separate from arg1)

example.name: with TMP
example.text: tourism in and through Hong Kong remains clouded by China 's turmoil since the June 4 killings in Beijing .
example.arg: since the June 4 killings in Beijing

example.name: oblique arg1
example.text: He says these bonds should appreciate in value as some investors , reacting to the recent turmoil in the stock and high-yield junk bond markets , seek safer securities .
example.arg: in the stock and high-yield junk bond market

example.name: with CAU
example.text: In turmoil caused by the previous Friday 's plunge in New York stocks , the Nikkei marked a sharp 647.33-point fall Monday .
example.arg: caused by the previous Friday's plunge in New York stocks

example.name: both args
example.text: manufacturers stress that production has n't been affected by China 's political turmoil.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on few examples in nouns-9998. No VNcls.
